## Correlations

-   Pearson correlation
    -   $Cov(X,Y)=\frac{1}{n-1}\Sigma(X_i-\bar{X})(Y_i-\bar{Y})$
    -   $Corr(X,Y)=\frac{Cov(X,Y)}{S_XS_Y}$
-   Spearman correlation
    -   $Corr(R(X), R(Y))
